content.description: The following questions are based on the graph provided, which shows the combinations of donuts and cups of coffee that the country of Deetopia could produce using its currently available resources.
content.question: Which of the following must be true?

choices.label: Combination T is allocatively efficient because customers will consume both donuts and cups of coffee.
Combination V is allocatively efficient because Deetopia has an absolute advantage in producing cups of coffee.

The opportunity cost of producing <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> cup of coffee is <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> donuts.

The opportunity cost of producing <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> cup of coffee is <math alttext="6" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> donuts.
The opportunity cost of producing <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> donut increases as more cups of coffee are produced.

content.answer: The opportunity cost of producing <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> cup of coffee is <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> donuts.
